Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: As a token-based application/client developer, I can query the ledger through a peer I trust to list my tokens into the system
Issue.description: *Acceptance*: Client wallet library for token operations in Fabric is enhanced with a function that takes as arguments the long term identity of an end-user and queries a peer on the set of tokens that this end-user owns. The peer receives the request and acts according to the specification of previous story.
